document_data.name: Twilight Marsh
document_data.histrefs: {{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|6}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Twilight Marsh''' was a swamp found in the [[Moonsea]] region of [[North Faer√ªn]].{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|2}}
document_data.Description: While the swamp was typically blanketed with heavy rain and a thick fog in the early hours of the morning, light from midday's sun shone through the canopy of trees in a manner that resembled the soft glow of sunset.{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|9}}

Geography.Geographical Features: As the [[Trank River]] flowed south from the [[Vanishing Hills]],{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|33}} it opened up into a depression in the land, flowing between the small tors and thick vegetation that made up the Twilight Marsh.{{Cite adventurers league/Drums in the Marsh|14}} As the currents formed by the river continued southward, they formed an eddy that encircled the archipelago known as the [[Ringcurrent Islands]].{{Cite adventurers league/Drums in the Marsh|16}}
Geography.Flora & Fauna:
The swamp was home to animals typically found in wetland environments, such [[crocodile]]s,{{Cite adventurers league/Drums in the Marsh|19}} swarms of biting insects, and [[snake]]s that would unsuspectingly drop down from tree branches.

Perhaps the most menacing of the swamp's wildlife were [[giant toad]]s, which could swallow a person whole in a single gulp.{{Cite adventurers league/Drums in the Marsh|15}}

document_data.History:
Some time in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the [[black dragon]] [[Throstulgrael]] relocated to the Twilight Marsh from the [[Flooded Forest]] to the south and killed the local king of the [[lizardfolk]] in a show of power. He then pit the lizardfolk tribes against one another, forcing them to compete for a role of chieftain of each tribe.

Over the next [[tenday]] or so, the lizardfolk of the swamp began abducting people from the surrounding areas,{{Cite adventurers league/Drums in the Marsh|7}} raiding farms north along the River Trank.{{Cite adventurers league/Drums in the Marsh|9}} Fortunately for the farmers and their families, a group of [[adventurer]]s rescued them from captivity and thwarted the plans of Throstulgrael. In an act of vengeance, the black dragon cut a swath of destruction across the surrounding lands of the Moonsea.{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|5}}
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Bloodroot Hollow]], home of the [[Bloodroot coven]] of [[hag]]s.{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|11}}
* [[Hall of the Black Bull]], a ruined keep once held by [[Cult of the Black Bull|cultists]] that was taken over by the black dragon Throstulgrael.{{Cite adventurers league/Raiders of the Twilight Marsh|17}}
